name: OctoGamex
description: OctoGamex is a single access point to the GameFi NFT ecosystem, built for in-game and metaverse assets, connecting gamers, games, and guilds around the world. $OGT is a management token for the OctoGamex ecosystem and is used as a payment instrument for NFT, commission sharing, as well as in rewards programs such as trading volume & staking rewards.
